name: NotACrazyTaxi
description:
NotACrazyTaxi tries to be a fast recreation of the Arcade Game Crazy Taxi. 

How to play: 

  • Pick a new passenger to carry on, you'll be able to spot them by the green circle around them. 
  • Transport the passenger to the destination (Blue circle). You'll see a hint next to the car! 
  • Repeat. 

Disclaimer: The arrow may be missleading while you are looking for a new passenger, feel free to ignore it.
